description: This file is a shell script that monitors /var/log/messages for utopia triggers related to new host events and invokes other services or logs based on certain conditions.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the monitoring service, kills older instances if running, links log files, and initiates tail and awk processes.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the monitoring service by killing the trigger process and updating status.
